plot: In part two of the reunion, Kelly and Vicki continue to hash out their issues. Shannon's emotional year filled with highs and lows is discussed as the women chime in about her divorce. Things quickly get messy when the group tries to figure out the game of telephone and who said what first about Emily's marriage. Emily opens up about the body shaming she received online. Emotions run high when Tamra and Shannon tackle their fractured friendship.
